flawed_nl_solution:
The total liters of juice he has is 5 jars x 2 liters/jar = <<5*2=10>>10 liters of juice
Then he needs to convert this amount to milliliters: 10 liters x 1000 milliliters/liter = <<10*1000=100000>>100000 milliliters
He can fill up to 100000 ml / 250 ml/glass = <<100000/250=400>>400 glasses
#### 400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10000, not 100000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
